content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot
Same problem as yesterday; https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83445 hasn't landed yet.
ah, now some other tests are also failing. also related to ZST. but that might be just compile-fail tests that are inherently masked by this optimization.
